Package org.engine.ui

Class StatBars

java.lang.Object
org.world.GameObject
org.engine.ui.StatBars
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<GameObject>
public class StatBars
extends GameObject
The StatBars element displays the current health and stamina of the player as colored bars whose lengths are directly proportional to said values. Also provides some relevant information used for the Weapon.lifesteal() ;} ability.
